title: Common Operating Picture Management
description: An operator must manage the Common Operating Picture (COP) during a multi-domain operation, ensuring all friendly and enemy tracks are accurately displayed.

tasks.description: Monitor incoming data feeds from air, sea, land, and space sensors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator maintains constant situational awareness of all data feeds.

tasks.description: Identify and resolve conflicting track information (e.g., two sensors reporting the same target in different locations).
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator correctly identifies and merges duplicate tracks into a single, accurate track.

tasks.description: Update the classification of tracks based on new intelligence or behavior.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator changes an 'unidentified' track to 'hostile' based on a new report, ensuring all users of the COP see the update.
